name: CAS 117 Project 1 - Solar System
description:
Additions to base project:

  1. Added the following planets of the Solar System
    1. Mercury
    2. Venus
    3. Mars
    4. Jupiter
    5. Saturn
    6. Uranus
    7. Neptune
  2. Added Chase camera to selected follow target
  3. Added solar system movement
  4. Added halo effect to the Sun
  5. Adjusted scale of entire system
    1. Distances not to scale
    2. Sizes to scale
    3. Orbital periods to scale
    4. Planetary rotation speeds to scale
  6. Added time manipulation features
  7. Added UI for the chase cam feature
  8. Added feature to toggle the mini map and chase came
  9. Added trails to all bodies in the Solar System
  10. Added feature to toggle trails of planets and The sun
  11. Added automatic camera distance based on outermost planet
  12. Added ability to focus between the inner 4 and outer 4 planets
    1. This will also turn of the trails of unrelated planets
  13. Added sounds effects to all planets in the system
  14. Added ability to shift camera to the Origin
  15. Adjusted comet spawn logic due to scaling changes
  16. Overhauled textures for all objects to HD (2k-8k)
  17. Overhauled Skybox textures to 8K HD
  18. Added Clouds to Earth
  19. Added Normal map to Earth 
  20. Imported Text Mesh Pro for the UI for high quality text

Credits:

Created by: Daniel Sohn

Planet Textures: https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/ (creative commons)

Planet Statistics: https://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/planetary/factsheet/planetfact_ratio_notes.html#rotp
